sense.def:
A message
je podatek ali prošnja, ki jo nekomu pošljemo ali pustimo.

seg.quote: Oh, there was a message. Professor Marvin rang. He'd like to meet you on Tuesday.
He sent a message to Sir Ian Hamilton saying he was returning.

sense.def:
A message
je tudi zamisel, ki jo nekdo poskuša sporočiti ljudem, na primer v igri ali govoru.

seg.quote: The play's message is that in the end good and right always triumph.
